short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies Selected Element ID to Clipboard via Right-Click context menu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Context menu icon that allows developers to right click and copy either individual element id, jQuery Selector, jQuery Variable Declarations or entire form jQuery/C#/VB selectors to the clipboard.
